DOC.brief_summary: Data CT image femoral neck BMD obtain 99 patient underwent cervical CT BMD simultaneously ( gap study within 6 month ) April 2009 December 2014 . There 52 female 47 male . The mean age 63.7 year ( female : 63.4 year , male : 64.1 ; range 32-86 year ) . The patient exclude destructive pathology severe spondylosis cervical pedicle cervical lateral mass . Patients divide three group accord femoral neck BMD ( Group A , T-score ≥-1 ; Group B , -2.5 < T-score < -1.0 ; Group C , T-score≤-2.5 ) . Group A normal BMD patient , Group B low normal patient include osteopenic patient Group C present osteoporotic patient . The mean HU number cortical bone area vertebral canal ( cHU , medial wall lateral mass ) , posterior wall transverse foramen ( fHU ) , medial ( mHU ) , lateral wall ( lHU ) trabecular area pedicle ( pHU ) measure axial CT image clinical image .
